title: What are the interactions of the elementary particles with each other? - Quora

response.answer_text: Gravitational interactions are of universal character while electromagnetic interactions concern only charged particles, strong interaction is only present in case of particles called hadrons while weak interactions exist for all elementary particles. Neutrinos and photons are quite special as they interact only via weak interaction (neutrinos) and only electromagnetically (photons). Fundamental Forces
Nothing much they keep “pulling” and “pushing” each other forming atomic structures.
